message.restore_instructions_line1: Enter info of the database we will restore backup to.
message.restore_instructions_line2: The empty database for restore should be created before the restore
message.restore_instructions_line3: . During the restore, all the current data will be cleared
message.restore_instructions_line4: Make sure the database is not used right now (most likely you do not want to restore the data to the same DB where the backup was made)
message.expected_duration_text: Expected restoration time usually 3x-5x longer than the backup duration (sometimes less, sometimes more depending on data type)
message.expected_duration_value: So it is expected to take up to {duration} (usually significantly faster)
